alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 5:21PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Baldwin and northwestern Escambia Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 521 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Molino, or 16 miles northwest of Gonzalez, moving southwest at 5 to 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Baldwin and northwestern Escambia Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
